title: Tractor and agricultural machinery maintenance program

subtasks: Sit in the driver's seat of a combine harvester
Engage the steering mechanism to guide the combine
Adjust the throttle to control the combine's speed
Engage the sieves to separate grain from chaff
Monitor the combine's grain bin through the rear window
Stop the combine at the grain delivery point
Operate the auger or conveyor belt to transfer grain
Ensure full coverage of the truck bed
Check the grain quality and moisture content
Check the grain for temperature and moisture levels
Clean and dry the grain as needed
Store the grain in appropriate conditions
Maintain records of harvest and grain movements
